projects.name: Fo_oD.Style
projects.shortDescription: This is an individual project created to gain experience in mobile design development. Applications Fo_oD Style aims to combine delivery.
projects.description: This is an individual project created to gain experience in mobile design development. Applications Fo_oD Style aims to combine delivery applications and find recipes applications for the convenience of quarantined users. The goal of the project was to achieve immersion of users by making it familiar and friendly.
projects.unique: The key aspect for this project was the combination of both regular food delivery and the ability to find many different recipes with step-by-step cooking
projects.tools: Figma, Adobe XD, Notion, paper, pen and imagination
projects.roleDescription: There was only me on the team. Make the application friendly using all the principles from (lawsofux.com)

storyboard.title: Enjoy the time
storyboard.description: It was another great day when I just do nothing in quarantine

storyboard.title: Mom's message
storyboard.description: Damn, mom wrote that the guests are coming soon and I need to make pasta, what should I do?

storyboard.title: Look for a recipes
storyboard.description: So, I have a Food Style application where I can find a recipe and, if I can't cook, I'll just order ready-made food.

storyboard.title: Check the fridge
storyboard.description: I found an easy recipe for pasta, it says that you need noodles, minced meat and tomato paste, I need to check the fridge

storyboard.title: Order ingredients
storyboard.description: It turns out I don't have minced meat, I need to order it and at the same time order pizza and sushi

storyboard.title: Take order
storyboard.description: All the order came, pretty quickly I didn't even have time to boil the paws

problems: There are many food delivery and cooking applications on the market
Filter ingredients (allergic, vegetarian, halal, ban ingredients)
Make the app unique and using features from other similar apps
Cluttering Interfaces with too much information on one screen
projects.ideate: I looked at many different delivery applications and recipes, identifying their shortcomings, created user flows and created lo-fi fidelity wireframes for them with marker and whiteboard, thinking about each step (is it necessary at all, if the user wants to go here, it can be moved and so on). Using lawsofux made the application right

prototype.name: Shop
prototype.ux: Browsing restaurants -> restaurant menus -> selecting dish ingredients

prototype.name: Cook
prototype.ux: Recipe Viewer -> Recipe Filter -> Cooking time, Daily regimen, Cuisine, Calories, Dietary

prototype.name: Cart
prototype.ux: Viewing a product -> Deleting a product -> Viewing bank cards -> View a delivery map and additional information

prototype.name: Fridge
prototype.ux: View Available Ingredients -> Remove Ingredients -> Add Ingredients to Fridge -> View Ingredients Store

projects.name: Canto
projects.shortDescription: This is an individual project created to gain experience in web design development. Applications Canto aims to redesign of the spotify.
projects.description: This is an individual project created to gain experience in mobile design development. Applications Canto is a music web application for promoting new songs and new artists. Gather the experience of all music applications and create your own product that everyone can use. The goal of the project was to achieve user immersion by making it familiar and friendly.
projects.unique: The key aspect of this project was the redesign of the spotify and creating the conditions for promoting new musicians and becoming popular.
projects.tools: Figma, Adobe XD, Notion, paper, pen and imagination
projects.roleDescription: There was only me on the team. Make the application friendly using all the principles from (lawsofux.com)

Facebook is needed to see what friends are listening
Additional info about the song and artists
